short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that allows mouse gestures with visual path drawing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An open-source extension that enables mouse gesture navigation with visual feedback. Draw gestures with your mouse to perform common browser actions like navigating back/forward, closing tabs, and reopening closed tabs.

Why Choose This Extension?
Unlike many similar addons, this extension prioritizes your privacy. The code is open-source and publicly available on GitHub, ensuring transparency. It does not track your browsing activity or compromise your data.

Privacy & Data Usage:
• Mouse movement is only tracked while drawing gestures
• All tracking data is temporary and immediately discarded after drawing
• No personal data is collected or stored
• No browsing history or website content is accessed
• Settings are stored locally in your browser only
